types.title: Area types list
types.description: List of area types that are supposed to be hosted

name.title: Area type name
name.description: Name of the area type as it may be displayed to the user

resource.title: Resource Name
resource.description: Name of the resource under which the geometrical data for this area type will be provided by the area server

table_name.title: Database table name
table_name.description: Name of the database table to use for storing geometries of this area type

geometries.title: Geometry types list
geometries.description: Specifies a list of geometry types that are supposed to be used for this area type

items.title: Geometry types
items.description: Geometry types that may be chosen for representing areas of this area type

filter_condition.title: Filter condition
filter_condition.description: Logical expression describing the OSM data to use for this area type

labels.title: Labeling flag
labels.description: Specifies whether the geometries for this area type are supposed to be labeled with names.

simplification.title: Simplification flag
simplification.description: Specifies whether the geometries for this area are supposed to be simplified with respect to the zoom level

zoom_min.title: Minimum zoom level
zoom_min.description: Minimum zoom value (inclusive) for which areas of this type are supposed to be displayed

zoom_max.title: Maximum zoom level
zoom_max.description: Maximum zoom value (exclusive) for which areas of this type are supposed to be displayed
